DOST-3 Teaching Module program for teachers.

kiosks.description: Meditation zone showcasing the Vertical Helophyte Filtration System.

kiosks.name: Innovation Lounge
kiosks.description:
Cafe-like innovation lounge with coffee bar.

Small group discussion area for:

  • Sharing of innovation stories (Sharing success stories by SETUP clients).
  • Techno Pitching.
  • Tech Talks.

kiosks.name: Sustainable Development Goal 1

Diorama of CEST communities in Luzon, Visayas, and Mindanao.

Stories of CEST communities.

Display of CEST products.

kiosks.name: Sustainable Development Goal 8
kiosks.description:
SETUP 2.0 Program: Social Responsive, Market Oriented, Agile, Resilient, Technology-Intensive Environment-Friendly, Resource Efficient (SMARTER) businesses.

SETUP products display.

Machine demonstration: CNC Laser Machine, Vertical Form Fill Seal Machine, 3D Printer Machine.

kiosks.name: Sustainable Development Goal 16
kiosks.description:
DOST programs and projects for Marawi City rehabilitation:

  • Scholarship program
  • Complementary Feeding program
  • Essential oils and Arroz caldo program
  • Other projects on Maranao Collection such as Lankit (Maranao weaving)

kiosks.name: Souvenir Shoppe
kiosks.description:
Locally-made items like t-shirts, mugs, key-chain, ballpen, and other goodies from DOST-assisted firms nationwide.

OneStore Vendo Machines and OneStore Kiosks for online purchases.
